question: What is the difference between getByRole() and getByText() selectors in Playwright testing?
answer: getByRole() finds elements by accessibility role/name, while getByText() matches by visible text content.
diagram:
flowchart TD
    A[Start Test] --> B{Need Element?}
    B -->|User Action| C[Use getByRole]
    B -->|Text Content| D[Use getByText]
    B -->|Form Input| E[Use getByLabel]
    B -->|Last Resort| F[Use getByTestId]
    
    C --> G[Auto-wait & Retry]
    D --> G
    E --> G
    F --> G
    
    G --> H[Perform Action]
    H --> I[Assert Results]
